name: Virtual CD Copy Template
summary: Learn about .VPS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Virtual CD templates can be selected from within Virtual CD's Image Wizard. When a template is chosen, the settings are automatically filled in.

description: Disc copy settings file created by Virtual CD, a disc authoring application; saves settings that specify how to copy a CD to a virtual CD file on the hard drive; enables settings to be reused with the same types of source CDs.
